sentences.sContent: He lapsed into the local vernacular (= language spoken in a particular area ).
sentences.sCn: 他说着说着就讲起了地方土话。

synos.tran: 本国的；地方的；用本地语写成的
本地话，方言；动植物的俗名

trans.tranCn: 本国的；地方的；用本地语写成的
本地话，方言；动植物的俗名
trans.tranOther: a form of a language that ordinary people use, especially one that is not the official language
